text:
When validation fails (e.g. on empty tags like "
    ") there is no more usecase.error generated in 2.0.3. Instead, the editor is re-displayed with the original (unchanged) content and changes are obviously not saved.
creator: hans@koerber-net.com

text: Does this issue still exist with the source editor?
creator: andreas@apache.org
rainer.schoepf@gmx.net
text:
There was a change to the HTML layout of error and info messages, in

  src/modules-core/usecase/templates/messages.jx

In particular, the class of the enclosing DIV was changed fromn lenya-error to lenyaInfoBox. Since the page2edit.xsl of the tinymce module selects on this class atribute to display the messages, errors are not shown.

Patch is appended.

  Rainer Schöpf
